project.description: this project is for xihe backend test image build

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e
GIT_EMAIL="tommylike@gmail.com" #IMAGE_VERSION=$(git rev-parse HEAD) IMAGE_VERSION=v0.0.1 PROJECT_NAME="xihe-test"
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then IMAGE_VERSION=$(git rev-parse HEAD) fi
if hash docker 2>/dev/null; then docker login -u cn-north-4@$DOCKER_USER -p $DOCKER_PASS swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/xihe/ else echo "docker not installed." exit fi
cd $WORKSPACE
cat Dockerfile
docker build -t swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/xihe/xihe-backend-test:$IMAGE_VERSION . docker push swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/xihe/xihe-backend-test:$IMAGE_VERSION
docker rmi swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/xihe/xihe-backend-test:$IMAGE_VERSION
if [ -d "infra-mindspore" ]; then rm -rf "infra-mindspore" fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git config --global user.email $GIT_EMAIL git config --global user.name $GIT_USER git clone https://$GIT_USER:$GIT_PASS@github.com/opensourceways/infra-mindspore cd infra-mindspore/applications/xihe-test else echo "git is not existing." fi
if hash kustomize 2>/dev/null; then kustomize edit set image swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/xihe/xihe-backend-test:$IMAGE_VERSION else echo "use replace to set image." fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git add . git commit -am "update xihe-backend-test:$IMAGE_VERSION" git push origin --all else echo "git is not existing." fi ARGOCD_TOKEN=`curl -X POST -s -d '{"password":"'${ARGOCD_PASS}'","username":"'${ARGOCD_USER}'"}' "https://build.osinfra.cn/api/v1/session"|tail -1 |awk -F '[""]' '{print$4}'`>/dev/null curl -X POST -s -o /dev/null --cookie "argocd.token=${ARGOCD_TOKEN}" "https://build.osinfra.cn/api/v1/applications/${PROJECT_NAME}/sync">/dev/null if [ $? -eq 0 ];then echo "complete!" else echo "failed!" fi
